text: Vspomni (o Mukhammad!), kogda apostoly skazali Ise: "O Isa, syn Maryam! Mozhet li tvoy Gospod' nisposlat' nam s neba trapezu so svyashchennoy pishchey, yesli ty poprosish' Yego?" Isa otvetil im: "Yesli vy istinno veruyete v Allakha, boytes' Yego, povinuytes' Yego nastavleniyam, prikazam i zapretam i ne prosite novykh znameniy, krome tekh, kotoryye vam uzhe byli predstavleny
